Thank you.. 
I noticed a thickening in my breast since this report was made.. I have an appointment with a new dr on Monday..Hope I can get answers.
Posts.Title: my report

Posts.Content:
hi..just trying to figure out this report. 
Wondering if I should followup before 6 months..
FINDINGS: Multiple sonographic images of the left breast show a 
hypoechoic focus just below the skin surface at the 1 to 2 o'clock 
position which measures 1.1 x 0.7 cm. It demonstrates posterior 
enhancement, has a slightly irregular wall. This is compatible with a 
complex cyst. Mammographic findings also suggest a benign lesion. 
IMPRESSION: Probably benign findings. Recommend a six-month left 
breast diagnostic mammogram and ultrasound. BI-RADS 3.
Posts.Title: my report
